summary: The Elucidator sword from Sword Art Online
descriptionHtml:
The Elucidator from the anime series Sword Art Online now brought into Skyrim!
This fine build sword is crafted from the Ebony category at any forge and enchantable/improvable, so make your Elucidator today!

Console Spawning:

As mods have a dynamic Item ID I can not provide the Item ID, although here is a tip to find it.

Open console and type: Help Elucidator
After this you should get the Elucidator Item ID
Now you can spawn it like you would with any other weapon/item.

Stats:
Weight: 17
Reach: 1.2
Speed: 1.4
Damage: 17
Crit Damage: 6
Damage Per Second: 23

Version 1.3

- Added a brand new scabbard
- Added slightly more damage to the sword
- Improved the specular shading
- Changed cubemap for slightly more reflectivity
- Fixed Blood Overlay

This new version will introduce a brand new scabbard for the Elucidator with some additional changes to the sword itself.

Version 1.5

- Fixed black lines mipmap bug
- Fixed lack of the Normal Map
- Moved up the sword so the hand is placed right below the guard
- Fixed reflection on the hilt
- Tweaked the gloss and specular values of the sword
- Fixed the hard edge lightning on the blood overlay

Duel Sheath Redux Patch:Â http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64647
author: Rafael De Jongh
